Death Cry.name: Death Cry
Death Cry.flavor: You strike and let out a macabre howl, sapping the strength of enemies before you.
Death Cry.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier necrotic damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Reaper's Rage.name: Reaper's Rage
Reaper's Rage.flavor: You strike with deadly intent and bellow, rooting your enemies in despair. From then on, you personify relentless death.
Reaper's Rage.effect: You howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast is immobilized (save ends). You enter the rage of the reaper. Until the rage ends, when any enemy ends its turn within 3 squares of you, you can shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to that enemy as a free action.

Killing Ground.name: Killing Ground
Killing Ground.flavor: After you send a foe to its afterlife, you issue a yell that infuses an area with the might of primal death.
Killing Ground.trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points
Killing Ground.effect: The blast creates a zone of death that lasts until the end of the encounter. You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and a +4 bonus to damage rolls against any enemy within the zone.
